Class GameConfig

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.models.GameConfig
public final class GameConfig extends Object
Immutable configuration for a given GameMode. At Phase 5.4 this is mainly a central place for tuning values. Later phases (Survival garbage, Hyper visibility, Rush-40) will read from this class instead of hard-coding numbers everywhere.
